definition: abbr. for Ukraine 烏克蘭|乌克兰[Wu1 ke4 lan2]/surname Wu
flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: Many traditional dishes in Japan have a soup base, like miso soup and udon noodles.
sentences.chinese: 日本传统佳肴都会搭配汤类，如味增汤和乌冬面。

sentences.english: The company produces Udon noodles in varieties of flavors, adopts the advanced Japanese skill, formula technology.
sentences.chinese: 多种口味的乌冬面，采用日本生产技术，配方工艺。

sentences.english: The term wonton is believed to be the origin for Japanese udon.
sentences.chinese: 馄饨一词被认为是原产地为日本乌冬面。

definition: tempura/deep-fried cooking/also called 甜不辣[tian2 bu4 la4]
oden, Japanese dish made with boiled eggs, processed fish cakes, daikon radish, tofu etc in a kelp-based broth
pasta (abbr. for 意大利麵|意大利面[Yi4 da4 li4 mian4])/(Tw) yi mein, a variety of Cantonese egg noodle
gimbap (Korean rice roll similar in appearance to sushi)/kimbap
